mapper.select: select b.book_id, sum(count) total , title, writer, image from books b join order_details od on b.book_id = od.book_id group by book_id order by total desc limit #{page},4

select b.book_id, sum(count) total, title, writer, image from orders o join order_details od on o.order_id = od.order_id join books b on od.book_id=b.book_id where orderdate between date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') and date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') group by book_id order by total desc limit #{page}, 4

select * from books where
title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
writer like concat('%',#{writer},'%')
publisher like concat('%',#{publisher},'%')
